name: The Sad Story of a Modern Idiot (Spencer Winson)
name_original: The Sad Story of a Modern Idiot (Spencer Winson)
description:
The Sad Story of a Modern Idiot (Spencer Winson) is a simulation game developed by Spencer Winson. It came out on 27-11-2016.
You can play The Sad Story of a Modern Idiot (Spencer Winson) on PC, macOS and Linux. The game is sold via itch.io.
